metadata.title: CVE-2021-0308 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: In ReadLogicalParts of basicmbr.cc, there is a possible out of bounds writedue to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation ofprivilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation. Product: Android; Versions: Android-8.1,Android-9, Android-10, Android-11, Android-8.0; Android ID: A-158063095.

criterions.comment: gdisk package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
